definition: of or relating to or characteristic of Greece or the Greeks or the Greek language, the language of Greece
details:
adjective
- of or relating to or characteristic of Greece or the Greeks or the Greek language
= example: of or relating to or characteristic of Greece or the Greeks or the Greek language
= synonyms: Hellenic, Grecian
noun
- the language of Greece
= example: the language of Greece
- a person from Greece or of Greek descent
= example: a person from Greece or of Greek descent
